parameters.name: PtzDisplay
parameters.description: True if the projected zone tolerance is displayed in the GTol, false if not

parameters.name: PtzHt
parameters.description: Height of the projected tolerance zone

title: IGtol.GetPTZHeight2
description: Gets the projected tolerance zone for the specified frame and tolerance in this GTol.
signature:
System.Boolean GetPTZHeight2( 
   System.Int32
FrameNumber
,
   System.Int32
TolNumber
,
   out System.Boolean
PtzDisplay
,
   out System.String
PtzHt
)

parameters.name: PtzDisplay
parameters.description: True if the projected zone tolerance is displayed in the GTol, false if not

parameters.name: PtzHt
parameters.description: Height of the projected tolerance zone

returns: True if the method executed successfully, false if not
remarks:
This method:
is valid only if this Gtol was created in a version of SOLIDWORKS earlier than 2022.
returns the height of the projected tolerance zone as a string because it is a user-specified parameter that can be textual, numeric, or both types of data.
